content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

### Additional Iron Furnaces
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. For example, attempting to insert iron ore into a furnace without having iron ore in the inventory will result in an error.

### Errors due to full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining operations from halting. For instance, the chest at position (41.5, -80.5) and (-14.5, -48.5) need to be emptied to continue mining operations.

### Errors due to furnaces having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to avoid them idling. For example, the furnaces at positions (-11.0, -48.0) and (-9.0, -48.0) have warnings for no ingredients to smelt.
